entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rainbow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
